data.author: Rumi
data.quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Come, seek, for search is the foundation of fortune: every success depends upon focusing the heart.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Gamble everything for love, if you are a true human being. Halfheartedness does not reach into majesty.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Lovers don’t finally meet somewhere. They’re in each other all along.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Why are you so enchanted by this world, when a mine of gold lies within you?

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: There is a voice that doesn’t use words. Listen.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: If you are irritated by every rub, how will you be polished?

data.author: Rumi
data.quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: I don’t believe in death, neither in flesh nor in spirit.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: When one door is closed, don't you know, another is open.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: Don’t gain the world and lose your soul. Wisdom is better than silver and gold.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: In this great future, you can’t forget your past.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: A hungry mob is an angry mob.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: Better to die fighting for freedom than be a prisoner all the days of your life.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: Don't trust people whose feelings change with time. Trust people whose feelings remain the same, even when the time changes.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: Every day the bucket a-go a well, one day the bottom a-go drop out.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: Every time I plant a seed, He say kill it before it grow, he say kill it before they grow.
